org.fujion.component

Class BaseComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.component.BaseComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IElementIdentifier, IClientTransform
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseCompositeComponent, BasePickerItem, BaseSourcedComponent, BaseUIComponent, Content, Page, Popup, Template, Timer

    public abstract class BaseComponent
extends Object
implements IElementIdentifier
    The abstract base class for all components.

        public static boolean validateName(String name)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getAttribute

        public <T> T getAttribute(String name,
                          T dflt)
        Returns the value of the named attribute, cast to the specified type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The attribute value's expected type.
        Parameters:
        name - The attribute name.
        dflt - The default attribute value. This will be returned under one of the following conditions:
        • The named attribute does not exist
        • The named attribute value is null
        • The named attribute value cannot be cast to the specified type
        Returns:
        The value of the named attribute, or the default value.

      • setNamespace

        @Component.PropertySetter(value="namespace",
                          bindable=false,
                          description="When true, this component acts as a namespace boundary.")
public void setNamespace(boolean namespace)
        When set to true, this component defines a namespace boundary. This may not be changed once a parent or children are added or for a component that implements the INamespace interface.
        Parameters:
        namespace - True to make component a namespace boundary.

      • getPage

        public Page getPage()
        Returns the page to which this component belongs.
        Returns:
        The owning page (may be null).

      • onAttach

        Throws:

      • addEventForward

        public void addEventForward(String eventType,
                            BaseComponent target)
        Adds an event forward. An event forward forwards an event of the specified type received by this component to another component.
        Parameters:

        target - The target for the forwarded event.

      • addEventForward

        public void addEventForward(String eventType,
                            BaseComponent target,
                            String forwardType)
        Adds an event forward. An event forward forwards an event of the specified type received by this component to another component, optionally with a different event type.
        Parameters:
        eventType - The event type to forward.
        target - The target for the forwarded event.
        forwardType - The type of the forwarded event. If null, the original event type is used.

      • notifyAncestors

        public void notifyAncestors(Event event,
                            boolean includeThis)
        Send an event to all the ancestors of this component. Event propagation stops if any recipient invokes the stopPropagation method on the event.
        Parameters:
        event - Event to send.
        includeThis - If true, include this component in the recipient chain.

      • notifyDescendants

        public void notifyDescendants(Event event,
                              boolean includeThis)
        Send an event to all the descendants of this component using a depth-first traversal. Event propagation stops if any recipient invokes the stopPropagation method on the event.
        Parameters:
        event - Event to send.
        includeThis - If true, include this component in the recipient chain.

      • wireController

        @Component.PropertySetter(value="controller",
                          bindable=false,
                          defer=true,
                          description="Controller to be wired to this component.")
public void wireController(Object controller)
        Wires a controller's annotated components and event handlers, in that order, using this component to resolve name references.
        Parameters:
        controller - The controller to wire. The following values are recognized:
        • self - Controller is the component itself.
        • <String> - Name of the class from which a controller instance will be created.
        • <Class> - The class from which a controller instance will be created.
        • All other - The controller instance to be wired.

      • getControllers

        public List<Object> getControllers()
        Returns an immutable list of controllers wired to this component.
        Returns:
        List of controllers wired to this component (never null).

      • getController

        public Object getController()
        Returns a reference to the last controller wired to this component.
        Returns:
        The last controller wired to this component, or null if none.

      • propertyChange

        protected boolean propertyChange(String propertyName,
                                 Object oldValue,
                                 Object newValue,
                                 boolean syncToClient)
        Handle changes to published properties. If the old and new values are the same, no action is taken. Otherwise, the client is notified of the new value (if syncToClient is true) and a PropertychangeEvent is fired.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - The property name.
        oldValue - The old value.
        newValue - The new value.
        syncToClient - If true, notify client of change.
        Returns:
        True if property value changed.

        protected void swapTrackedComponents(BaseComponent track,
                                     BaseComponent untrack)
        Swap tracking from one component to another. This is a convenience method for calling trackComponent(org.fujion.component.BaseComponent) and untrackComponent(org.fujion.component.BaseComponent) in succession.
        Parameters:
        track - Component to track.
        untrack - Component to untrack.
